--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, "sleepinafire" <paranormal7@h...> wrote:
> Hi, does anyone have the game Othello which using the NEAT
algorithm 
> for its AI?. If so could you post the code as it would be a great 
help 
> to me, thanks, :).

You could try to contact the author of this old paper:

http://www.cs.utexas.edu/ftp/pub/techreports/tr02-32.pdf

His name is Timothy Andersen.  But he's no longer at UT...I forget
his 
current school but he's at grad school now, I believe.  He was an 
undergrad when he wrote that paper as a school project.  If you could 
track him down he might have his old code.

ken
